content.text:
# Michael Eliot Howard

#redirect Michael Howard (historian)
Michaels Covenate.
The Ten Commandments.
The Law.
# Thal shalt not worship any other strange gods before thy lords your god.
# Thal shalt not make unto you any graven images.
# Thal shalt not take thy lords your gods name in vain.
# Thal shalt remember thy lords your gods Sabboth day and to keep it holy always.
# Thal shalt honor thy father and thy mother always.
# Thal shalt not kill.
# Thal shalt not committ adultery.
# Thal shalt not steal.
# Thal shalt not bear false witness against thy neighbor's.
# Thal shalt not want thy neighbor's goods nor thy neighbors husband nor thy neighbors wife.
# Sincerly, Krist. 02/26/29/2025.
__FORCETOC__
